description: Dart compile-time constants for Roomix Flutter app

MAPMYINDIA_API_KEY.description: MapMyIndia API key for static maps, search, and geocoding

FIREBASE_API_KEY.description: Firebase API key for web authentication

notes: MAPMYINDIA_API_KEY is read at compile-time via String.fromEnvironment() in lib/services/map_service.dart
NO hardcoded fallback key is shipped - maps will be disabled without MAPMYINDIA_API_KEY
For Android, the key is also injected via manifestPlaceholders in build.gradle.kts
For web builds, also provide FIREBASE_API_KEY and other Firebase credentials
Windows CMD: set MAPMYINDIA_API_KEY=your_key then flutter run
CI/CD: Set MAPMYINDIA_API_KEY in environment variables before building
